skills.name: JavaScript
description: JavaScript and TypeScript are my most proficient languages.

I also have experience building interactive web applications with vanilla JavaScript.

skills.name: TypeScript
description: JavaScript and TypeScript are my most proficient languages.
I have frequently built my personal projects with a Node.js/Express.js backend and React.js frontend.

skills.name: HTML
description: In building web applications, I have worked with HTML extensively.
More recently, I use JSX and TSX to structure the layout of my pages

skills.name: CSS
description: In building web applications, I have worked with CSS extensively.
I have experience writing vanilla CSS but also experience using CSS-in-JS libraries such as styled-components and utility classes from Tailwind.
I have also used UI libraries such as Material UI, Mantine, Radix and Shadcn.

skills.name: React
description: I have built most of my web applications with React.js.
This includes having worked extensively with React hooks such as useState and useEffect. I am still developing my skills regarding state management.
I have used a range of CSS frameworks and UI libraries as outlined in the 'CSS' tab.

skills.name: Vue
description: I worked with Vue.js 3 during my time at WiseTech Global.
My tasks included creating a modal to allow users to edit task estimates for a productivity board and connecting it to the backend.
I was also responsible for fixing various styling issues such as malfunctioning data table.

skills.name: C
description: My first programming language learnt at university.
I have experience coding basic programs using C with consideration for memory management.
This is also the language used to teach data structures and algorithms.

skills.name: C#
description: I worked with C# extensively to implement business logic during my time at WiseTech Global.
This includes experience creating services using the controller-service-repository design pattern,
creating GUIs using WinForms, implementing filters as well as designing new classes.

skills.name: Git
description: I have used Git everywhere e.g. GitHub, Azure DevOps and GitLab.

skills.name: SQL
description: I have strong skills in SQL having worked with various DMBSs such as PostGreSQL and Microsoft SQL Server.
This includes experience helping maintain CDC and ETL pipelines during my time in the Business Intelligence team at WiseTech Global.

skills.name: Java
description: I learnt Object-Oriented Programming at university with Java.
I am trying to develop my skills with the 'Buckets' personal project where I am in the process of developing a web application
using Spring Boot, Maven and Hibernate.

skills.name: Python
description: I have foundational knowledge of Python, having used Flask to create Python web services.
In addition, I used Python to implement algorithms for the machine learning course I took at University of Toronto.

skills.name: MongoDB

skills.name: Docker
description: I have worked with Docker - having developed programs in containers as well as actually performing the containerisation of a project.
